200.description: Returns list of installed and available plugins

get.description:
Get plugin view. Required parameters:
 * **id** - get plugin view by id 
 * **name**, **Accept** and **Accept-Language** - get plugin view by type, parameter **type** is optional.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: View type (config or view). Only use for application/xml

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: View type (config or view). Only use for application/xml

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: View format to return. Accepted: application/json and application/xml.

400.description: Bad request. Returned if Accept value is unsupported.

404.description: Not Found. Return if plugin type does not exist.

post.description: Install plugin. Valid only for HC2. In HC3 each plugin is being installed during the adding.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of installing plugin. Type it like a **form data**.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of installing plugin. Type it like a **form data**.

200.description: Interfaces has been added or removed
Returns list of available IP cameras

get.summary: Get information about plugins in system
get.description: Get information about plugins in system

requestBody.description: Component information needed to update plugin

400.description: Bad request. Returned if Accept value is unsupported.

404.description: Not Found. Return if plugin type does not exist.

text.description: The Text displayed as the content of the button

description.example: IP Bell – Zadbaj o bezpieczeństwo Twojego domu kilkoma kliknięciami integrując wideodomofon z systemem Fibaro. Plugin umożliwia sterowanie wideodomofonem IP Bell oraz podgląd obrazu z kamery wideodomofonu za pomocą interfejsu Fibaro.

predefined.description: Describes whether the plugin is predefined in the system.
